about_the_game:
Hexed Time is a hand-drawn point-and-click puzzle adventure set in a small medieval village. You play as Amelia - she might seem like an ordinary grocer in her town, but don't let her common life deceive you. Amelia is a witch, able of many spells and curses.

One night, a prophecy reveals the terrible fate of her dear friend. To save her, she traps the following day in a time loop, ending only if the friend is still alive when midnight strikes. Unfortunately, Amelia could not foresee an unpleasant visit. On that day, the inquisition arrives in the village with only one goal: To expose and burn the witch.

What will be the correct way out of the repeating day?

Features:

  • Cast spells and make potions to help you escape the time loop

  • Explore your village and discover how your actions during the day affect your surroundings and neighbors

  • Reach 3 different endings and determine, which will be your preferred one

name: Hexed Time
short_description: Hand-drawn puzzle adventure where you play as a witch in disguise from other village folks. One day, trying to save her friend, she gets trapped in a time loop. Help the witch and her cat escape while hiding away from the Inquisition.
